---

This terrifying mask is crafted in the visage of a leering demon and grants a +1 item bonus to Intimidation checks. 

**Activate—Leering Mask** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The mask casts a [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) spell with a DC of 20.
